info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Primeguard™ is a water-based acrylic primer designed to have excellent adhesion on hard-to-adhere metal surfaces.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: For galvanized iron, stainless steel, aluminum, and other hard-to-adhere metal subtrates.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Exceptional Adhesion
info.body: It has exceptional adhesion on galvanized iron, stainless steel, and aluminum substrates. It is also compatible with most topcoats.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Rapid Drying
info.body: It dries in 2 hours compared to 12 hours for enamel primers. This results in faster paint jobs and significant labor cost savings.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Environmentally Sound
info.body: It is relatively low in odor, non-flammable, and does not contain hazardous solvents or lead.

info.title: FEATURES
info.subtitle: Easy Water Clean-up
info.body: No need for thinners and solvent reducers. Painting tools and spills can be easily cleaned with soap and water.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body:
Wipe the surface with a rag soaked in paint thinner to remove grease, oil, wax and other foreign matter. 
For recoating pre-painted galvanized surfaces in good condition, wipe the surface with a clean rag before applying paint. Remove all loose paint film to sound surface. Spot prime bare substrate.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: New Metal
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Primeguard™ 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Roofgard™ , BOYSEN®® Cool Shades™ , BOYSEN®® Acqua Epoxy™ , BOYSEN®® Epoxy Enamel, BOYSEN®® Acrytex™ , BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel
